Package com.example.enigma.Model.Encryption.Substitute

Class SubstituteParent

java.lang.Object
com.example.enigma.Model.Encryption.Substitute.SubstituteParent
Direct Known Subclasses:
SubstituteCipher, SubstituteDeCipher
public class SubstituteParent extends Object
The SubstituteParent class is a parent class for substitution ciphers. It provides common functionality and attributes for different types of substitution ciphers.
Author:
Mojtaba Alizade
